children.title: Discover Teradata notebooks
children.description: Get started with a sample notebook and see how to add computations, visualizations, SQL commands, and more.

children.title: Learn about ModelOps
children.description: Learn how to deploy, monitor, and manage your machine learning models.

children.title: Build projects, add datasets, and select models
children.description: A project contains the models, datasets, and other resources to train, evaluate, and deploy models.

children.title: Define models
children.description: Use models from specific Git repositories or bring your own Python, R, or SAS model.

children.title: Train, evaluate, and deploy models
children.description: Evaluate, compare, and approve new model versions for multiple environments.

children.title: Monitor model deployments
children.description: Create predictions and monitor use case performance.

children.title: Work with Airflow
children.description: Author, schedule, and monitor batch-oriented workflows.

children.title: Learn about vector store
children.description: See how you can use semantic relationships and similarity to enable your AI/ML applications.

children.title: Create a vector store collection
children.description: Convert data for semantic search integration and RAG applications.

children.title: Explore using vectors in notebooks
children.description: Learn about searching for and retrieving vectors for your models.

children.title: Test collections in the playground
children.description: Ask questions and test the similarity search for each collection.
